text: "Enjoy the Silence" is a very popular song by the English band Depeche Mode. German DJ, Timo Maas made a remix of the song. Lacuna Coil covered this song on one of their albums. == References == Category:1990 songs Category:Depeche Mode songs Category:Tori Amos songs Category:Susan Boyle songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Enjoy the Silence
